effect.kubejs.well_fed.description: Grants regeneration, extra armor, and combat bonuses while well fed.
effect.kubejs.golden_might.description: Restores health faster in the depths and enhances mining speed below 0
effect.kubejs.frostburner.description: Grants a chance to Chill struck enemies and a smaller chance to Freeze them briefly.
effect.kubejs.buff_galore.description: Enemies killed have a high chance to drop a Buff.
effect.kubejs.crusader_aura.description: Grants the Crusader Protection effect to nearby allies.
effect.kubejs.crusader_protection.descri: Provided by being near a crusader affected by the Crusader Aura.
effect.kubejs.sun_light.description: Casting a Holy Spell on an ally grants them additional defensive effects.
effect.kubejs.prior_faith.description: Casting a Holy Spell on an ally applies the Holy Warmth effect. If the target already has Holy Warmth, it is consumed to empower them and increase the caster’s mana regeneration.
effect.kubejs.holy_warmth.description: Can be consumed by a spellcaster with the Prior’s Faith effect.
effect.kubejs.skyjade_knowledge.descript: After spending 250 mana, gain the Skyjade's Strength effect.
effect.kubejs.infernal_fire.description: When above 85% health, unleash the Enforcer’s Wrath, drastically boosting your offensive capabilities
effect.kubejs.soul_collector.description: Defeating an enemy starts a 10-second killstreak timer. Every 5 kills grants a stack of Soul Gorged (up to Soul Gorged V at 25 kills) and resets the timer
effect.kubejs.soul_gorged.description: Stacks up to V, each level amplifying your offensive power. Maintain your killstreak to maximize its potential
effect.kubejs.marauder_buff.description: After taking a total damage of 70 HP, activate Marauder’s Light, empowering your magical prowess, especially in the Holy School
effect.kubejs.marauder_light.description: Enhance multiple magical attributes, especially for the Holy School
effect.kubejs.dragon_protection.descript: When health drops below 45%, gain Dragon’s Bones. Below 20% health, the effect upgrades to Dragon’s Bones III, significantly bolstering your defenses
effect.kubejs.valkyrie_aura.description: Taking damage heals nearby allies equal to 15% of the damage taken. Slight chance to also grant them with the Valkyrie Protection effect
effect.kubejs.plated_valkyrie.descriptio: Heal yourself for 15% damage taken (unless fatal damage), while under 25% grants you the Plated Defense III effect
effect.kubejs.phoenix_embrace.descriptio: When health falls below 60%, ignite the Phoenix Rage effect. The lower your health, the more potent the effect becomes
effect.kubejs.bloody_mind.description: Striking an enemy grants Bloody Strength, while taking damage grants Bloody Skin. Only one effect can be active at a time
effect.kubejs.blossom_aura.description: Hitting enemies may inflict Thorned. Killing a Thorned enemy grants Blossom Aroma, while failing to kill them releases Blossom Pollen to you and nearby allies
effect.kubejs.nether_embrace.description: Using a Holy Spell on an ally grants them Fire Resistance and Nether Reinforcement
effect.kubejs.nether_reinforcement.descr: Hitting an enemy consumes this effect to grant Nether Heat. Taking damage consumes this effect to grant Nether Protection instead
effect.kubejs.ignitium_magic.description: Taking 80 HP of damage grants Ignitium Protection. Spending 500 mana grants Ignitium Charge. If both effects are active, they are consumed to grant Overcharged
effect.kubejs.ignitium_protection.descri: Increase your defenses and mana regeneration
effect.kubejs.overcharged.description: You're Overcharged! All combat and magical attributes are significantly enhanced for a limited time
effect.kubejs.hunter.description: Hitting an enemy applies Marked. Hitting a Marked enemy grants Hunter’s Readiness
effect.kubejs.ranger_mind.description: Nearby pets gain Pet Cozyness. With 5 or more pets nearby, gain Ranger Cozyness
effect.kubejs.neptune_buff.description: Remaining immobile for a few seconds grants Neptune’s Blessing. The longer you stay still, the stronger the effect. Shooting mobs while active has a high chance to trigger Rapid Healing
effect.kubejs.leviathan_call.description: Holding a compatible weapon in the main hand grants its corresponding bonus effect
